issue.title: [C++] Handling of non-aligned slices in Sum kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4531](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4531). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Sum kernel does not support slices where the offset is not byte-aligned. Other kernels avoid this problem due to BitmapReader usage.
